text: Ivan Radivojević (born 8 November 1968) is a retired Serbian football midfielder.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Napredak Kruševac players Category:FK Partizan players Category:NK Olimpija Ljubljana (1945–2005) players Category:FC Lokomotiv 1929 Sofia players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Bulgaria Category:Serbian expatriate sportspeople in Bulgaria
title: Ivan Radivojević
